meta.description: The Couchbase Server driver extension provides access to functions and features of the Couchbase Server using the original Couchbase Java Driver. This extension has NOT been developed by CouchBase and is therefore NOT an offical driver nor is it supported by CouchBase.
meta.author: Dannes Wessels

ul.li: Improved conversion of XQuery-JSON objects to Couchbase-JSON objects and vice versa.
Upgrade to Java driver version v2.4.3.
